body.name: USX MOUNT Full Motion TV Wall Mount Bracket for 32-90" TVs up to 150lbs with 8" Sliding Design, Ultra-Large TV Mount for up to 24" Studs with Swivel, Tilt, Extension & Leveling, Max VESA 600x400mm
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 33 mins
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 2 hrs 33 mins
features: Ultra-large and Sturdy: The upgraded TV wall mount fits 8" 12" 16" 18" 24" wood studs. Made of heavy-duty steel and dual articulating arms, the full motion TV mount is solid and durable enough to fits for TVs up to 150lbs and display sized 32-90 inch.

Centered Control: Designed with 8" sliding function which allows TV to shift left or right easily, the wall mount TV bracket is convenient to center your TV on the wall plate. The 65 inch tv wall mount can not be installed on drywall alone.

Full Motion Adjustable: The swivel tv wall mount can be tilted +5°/-15°and swivesled +/-45°for more comfortable viewing experience. You can pull out the tv mount bracket to 19.0" and retract back to 3.35", which save some valuable space for you.

Easy to Install: Easy installation within 10 minutes. All hardware is included in pre-labeled bags. Horizontal post installation leveling +/-3° for easier and quicker installation. If you need concrete anchors, please contact us to get it.
What you get: The 85 inch tv wall mount full motion includes bubble level, 3 pieces pack of cable ties, all standard mounting hardware, and 10-year friendly US-based customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ADJUSTABLE VIEW COMFORTABLE: This TV bracket with dual articulating arms includes +5° /-15° tilt, ±45°swivel( maximum swivel angle depends on your TV), +/-3°post-installation adjustment allows the perfect TV leveling. You can pull out this full motion tv wall bracket to 19.09” and retract back to 3.35", which save some valuable space for you and make your house look neat.ULTIMATE CENTERING CONTROL: Wall mount TV bracket with clever design allows TV sliding max 8” total on the 24”wall plate.DURABLE and RELIABLE: Features with heavy duty stainless steel construction, dual 6 arms design to support TVs up to 150 lbs, which makes whole TV mounting bracket unit sturdy and safe

You can pull out this full motion tv wall bracket to 19.09” and retract back to 3.35", which save some valuable space for you and make your house look neat. This TV bracket with dual articulating arms includes +5° /-15° tilt, reduce the glare from light. Want to watch movie with your family at any seat in the room? You can adjust your wall mount TV bracket left or right 45° for the optimal view.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good, sturdy mount that works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to hang an oldschool 80" Sharp LED that weighs 131lbs and am very satisfied with it. It I tried to push it to its limits at 150lbs I might be a little concerned about its ability to hold the tilt but I have no reason to doubt that it would hold the TV itself.Installation is straightforward and I really liked that it included a good mix of bolts and spacers to support almost any configuration of TV setup. I drilled this into studs under Durarock and it is absolutely solid. Installation is easy to do with one person but hanging and adjusting a TV will require 2-3 depending on how much it weighs.The tilt features work smoothly and hold the TV in place no matter how you put it. Again, if you're right at the 150lb mark I don't know for sure whether or not you'd be happy but at 131lbs its holding the TV exactly where I put it. Great range of motion and being able to pull it away from the wall, work on it, then shove it back up against the wall exactly where I need it is a huge plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy mounting, holds TV in place well.
reviews.reviewText: We just bought an 86" flat screan that wieghs 96lbs. This mount was easy to assemble, and is holding the TV in place very well. (Our past mount would droop over time) My walls have 24" stud spacing, so centering the tv would not be possible without the side to side sliding hardware. I am very happy with the sturdiness of this mount, and the side to side adjustability made centering on our wall a snap!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, sturdy and maneuverable
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent TV mount. It comes with everything you need to mount your TV. All sorts of screws and spacers are provided and the wall template that they give you makes it very easy to line up the mounting screws to your studs. Since the mount can slide from side to side you will have plenty of play to be able to mount to the studs even if they are not centered.Once you have the mount installed it is very simple to hang your TV and the stand is very sturdy. My TV is not going anywhere. It's great to be able to pull the TV out and angle it whenever you need to move a cable around or something like that. This is an excellent piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty and easy to install.
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic tv wall mount. I had another brand ready to install and discovered that my studs were 24” apart, not the standard 16”. So I bought this one and it solved the issue. I drilled the holes into the studs and used the included lag bolts to screw the mount securely to the wall. All hardware was included and I easily installed the brackets on the back of a 65” Hisense TV with attached sound bar. I like to organize cables so I used clips and sticky Velcro to mange cables. I wanted a while cord hanging down so I bought a small flat square power strip and used sticky Velcro to attach to the back of the tv. All items are plugged into that, and when I pull the mount out, only 1 white cord hangs down. It’s solid and I can pull it out and swivel it to watch from a different angle. I’m a female in my 60’s. 💪🏻 Would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is sturdy and easy to install. Once installed, very steady. It can be improved. The piece that gets screwed to the wall should be longer allowing more horizontal freedom while hanging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ROCK SOLID - Great on my 85” TCL
reviews.reviewText: This wall Mount is one of my favorites and this company is one of the best as far as giving you plenty of advantageous hardware to make sure you safely and solidly install their mount. We had a professional for this install, and he likened it to the mounts they sold at Best Buy at 2x and 3x the cost. He stated that the quality was really good and the hardware kit was exceptional. Nice additions like Velcro ties for the cables is always a great benefit too.This was installed directly into studs and we sunk the lag screws provided and they were extremely solid. Using a hammer drill to get it as tight as possible after pre-drilling the holes was beneficial and allowed for an ease of install.Once the Mount was on the wall, the best part of this system became evident - how the TV hangs on it. By installing the hardware on the back of the TV we were able to lift the TV, set it on the upper bar, and then flip up the securing brackets on the lower bar, screw them in, and it was done. It is one of the easiest mounts to install the actual TV and also one of the most secure mounts I’ve used and we have 4 hung TV’s in our home and on our patio. Whenever we upgrade other TV’s we will be upgrading the mount with this one. It’s incredible and I would highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed by this TV mount. After reading reviews of other mounts I was concerned about overall quality and the ability to handle an 80+ pound TV but NO issues at all with this mount. Screwed it into the studs using the included lags and it's rock solid - no worries about extending the mount fully as it easily supports the weight. Also the side to side tilt adjustability makes it easy to address any issues with the mount being slightly out of level - just loosen a couple of hex screws, tilt the TV to where you want it, and tighten the screws back up - easy. I feel the price paid for this was very resonable given the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Holds a TCL 75 inch without any issues, comes with ties for cables. Very good quality.

I have mounted many tv’s on the wall and this one is the nicest and was pretty easy to set up. Everything included worked well and I appreciate the template included. My hardest part during installation was finding the wall studs and making sure as I drilled holes and bolted to the wall it remained level. All in all it’s a pretty nice mount and does what I need it to do.

This mount should be rated #1 on all the Youtube review videos. The center plate can be moved either left or right 8" each way to further center the TV on a wall. The 24" max stud spacing (wider wall plate) provides a more stable wall mount, even though I use the 16" spacing on 2x6 studs. Lubricated with "SuperLube" oil to make the arms to move smoothly. This is a very well made and sturdy TV mount with adjustable features. Glad I purchase this mount over the Sanus brand. Familiarize yourself with the functions of the mount and the install will be easy. This was the 4th time for installing TV mounts, not my first rodeo. Highly recommend
Easy to assemble, and easy to hang on the wall. No issues. Great product.

Fast shipping and very solid mount. Easy installation and all the proper hardware and instructions included. Came in a box that was obviously opened before but the items were all properly packaged inside and nothing was damaged.

Wall mount works great, fully articulating and retains excellent support for heavy TVs even when fully extended. This is a good, solid product and offers the most possible adjustments/offsets when trying to center big TVs to stud wall on16" centers. For my application some M8x30mm bolts were required and not included with the kit.
